title: ⚡ Search Function! ⚡
description: Now you can search for a song easily.
changes: Added search bar
You can add to queue directly from search
You can like from search bar as well

title: ⚡ Quality of Life Improvements ⚡
description: A lot of tiny changes to make your life easier. Still there are some very specific bugs which need to be taken care of.
changes: Liked Songs playlist with framer-motion animation
Like Songs playlist heading for easy column identification
Clickable album name on the Liked Songs playlist
Added the 'Add To Queue' button beside the heart button
You can now add songs from anywhere to the queue
You can click on album names to redirect to respective album in queue page
Added queue page animation, handled wrapping of songs at start and end

title: ⚡ New Modal Fetch Method ⚡
description: Now changing just a JSON file will automatically fetch the update details for the modal.
changes: Fixed an issue with Liked Songs playlist where in view liked songs didn't appear
Fixed seekbar and timer syncing issues when switching contexts
Corrected volume slider behavior to prevent accidental song restarts
Added smooth hover effects to the playback slider handle

title: Context Aware Playback! ⚡
description: Now the player is fully aware of exactly where your song is being played from.
changes: Isolated song playback state between Album and Liked contexts
Fixed seekbar and timer syncing issues when switching contexts
Corrected volume slider behavior to prevent accidental song restarts
Added smooth hover effects to the playback slider handle

title: Initial Release
changes: Core music streaming engine live
Supabase authentication integration
Full library and album support
